mapper.insert: insert into tbl_account (id, name, accessToken, email, isAuth, password, platformType, profileImage, refreshToken, createdDate, modifiedDate) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{accesstoken,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isauth,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{platformtype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{profileimage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{refreshtoken,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createddate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifieddate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update tbl_account set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, accessToken = #{accesstoken,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, isAuth = #{isauth,jdbcType=CHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, platformType = #{platformtype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, profileImage = #{profileimage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, refreshToken = #{refreshtoken,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createdDate = #{createddate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modifiedDate = #{modifieddate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, name, accessToken, email, isAuth, password, platformType, profileImage, refreshToken, createdDate, modifiedDate from tbl_account where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select id, name, accessToken, email, isAuth, password, platformType, profileImage, refreshToken, createdDate, modifiedDate from tbl_account
